title: 2025 Salsa Fargo Gets Flat Mount Brakes
content:
Aside from a new frame color, GRX and Apex build options, and a titanium chassis option, Salsa‘s tried and true drop bar 29er MTB platform, the Fargo, received a few minor updates for 2025…

The 2025 Fargo still holds onto that same DNA found in its predecessors with a compact geometry and an MTB chassis with boost-spaced wheels.  Unlike the carbon cousin, the Cutthroat, the Fargo has rack mounts on the rear triangle for fully-loaded touring but the 2025 model now shares the Cutthroat’s fork. With the cable routing underneath the top tube, it’ll be covered by a frame bag and protected from mud and grime, too.

The main update is the touring platform now has flat-mount brakes on the Alternator dropouts and Cutthroat fork.

2025 Updates

  • Alternator 1.0 Flat Mount plate
  • Allows for flat-mount brakes on swinging Alternator 1.0 dropouts
  • Cutthroat Carbon fork
  • Abrasion-resistant plates
  • Titanium frame available

See more at Salsa Cycles.
